title: Enthrall Me
description: The vacation where Christian and Alexis would learn more about their powers has instead become a test of their relationship. He discovers a side of himself he wished he hadn’t. Something evil is growing within him, something he can’t seem to control. He had thought the biggest threat to Alexis was Nicolas, only to realize their worst enemy maybe himself. But when Nicolas’s revenge plan goes bad, and Alexis is taken instead of Christian, can Nicolas and Christian work together to save Alexis’s life?
author: Anne Violet
